pullRequest.title: DPC-860: Navigation bug on top tabs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Why
If you login and click on either the 'Support' or 'Documentation' tabs, you cannot navigate back to the 'Account' page unless you logout again. You can only get to the 'Profile' page. This is confusing to users.
What Changed

Home button added to the navigation bar.
When a user hovers over any of the three buttons, the color will change and the text will be underlined.
When a user hovers over DPC's title, the text changes color but does not have an underline to maintain the shape of the logo and text together.

Rails Update

Updated rails version to 5.2.4 to fix javascript patch. More info here.

Choices Made



The maximum size for the drop-down navigation bar was changed from 860px to 962px to accommodate the extra link and make sure all buttons are visible.


Tickets closed:
DPC-860
Future Work
DPC-1207: Consolidate RoR App Stylesheets
Checklist

 All tests are passing via make ci-app (app change) and make ci-web (website change)
 Swagger documentation has been updated
 FHIR documentation has been updated
 Any required dpc-ops changes have a PR submitted and mentioned in this ticket
 Any manual migration steps are documented, scripts written (where applicable), and tested
 Before merging, any required dpc-ops changes have been approved and merged into master of the dpc-ops repo
